title: Man hanging from Scott Monument brought to safety
text:
Topix › Pacific Travel › Man hanging from Scott Monument broug... Man hanging from Scott Monument brought to safety Next Story Prev Story 10 hrs ago Read more: Scotsman.com 
Congratulations, you're now registered! Let us know what news and updates you want to hear about and we'll send them straight to your inbox. The man who was hanging from the edge of the Scott Monument in Edinburgh city centre has been brought down safely. Start the conversation, or Read more at Scotsman.com.
